conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is valid with clear isometric-style 3D geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Robust 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and floor separation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout matches although the staircase area is simplified and several doors are missing or replaced by open thresholds.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is present and mostly accurate to room functions, though the balcony area lacks the specific seating shown in the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and clear material distinction; background is neutral and professional.

detected_errors.description: Staircase area in the top left is not properly rendered as a 3D stair structure.
Inner layout of the bathroom and WC partitions are simplified/merged compared to the 2D plan.

summary: A high-quality 3D transformation that maintains the core footprint and room identities of the original architectural plan.
